meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02271. For the tenths digit, the wheel is between 2 and 3. Since the hundredths dial has not passed 0.09, the tenths digit is read as the lower value, 2. So, odometer_value is 2271.2. The red needle points between 0.03 and 0.04, approximately halfway, making it 0.035. The 0 on the dial is at 0 degrees, 0.01 at 36 degrees, 0.03 at 108 degrees, and 0.04 at 144 degrees. Halfway between 0.03 and 0.04 is 126 degrees.
